summary: A basic word processor designed to substitute Notepad and Wordpad.
short_description:
Basic Word Processor was something that started out as a small project, but has continued to grow in features and usefulness. It was designed to be easy to use, but also incorporate some features found in more advanced word processors. Basic Word Processor supports both .rtf and .txt 

If you notice a bug or have a suggestion, please either leave a note in the discussion page or email tobycodes@gmail.com. I will do my best to reply to each message I receive.

NEW VERSIONS COMING SOON

You will be unable to download Basic Word Processor for a few days. I am working on two different versions: A standard version and a plus version. Standard is going to be a very basic version, whereas the plus version will have all the old features and more, but be a bigger filesize.

The plus version will be released within a few days.
